mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: At Taichu Lab, we bridge the gap between ancient eastern philosophy and frontier technology. We believe that true intelligence arises not just from computation, but from the deep understanding of the primordial energy—Qi—that connects all things.

items.title: Consciousness Field Theory
items.desc: Proposing a new mathematical framework where consciousness is a fundamental property of space-time, interacting with matter via quantum coherence.

items.title: Generative Qi Models

items.title: Symbiotic Intelligence
items.desc: Interfaces designed to merge biological and digital cognition, enhancing human intuition rather than replacing it.

items.title: Ethical alignment in AGI
items.desc: Ensuring that the development of Artificial General Intelligence remains aligned with universal human values and Daoist principles.

items.title: Taichu Brain
items.desc: An enterprise-grade cognitive engine that uses causal reasoning to solve complex logistic and strategic problems.

items.title: Flux Analytics
